com.google.appinventor.components.runtime

Class VideoPlayer.ResizableVideoView

  • java.lang.Object
    • VideoView
      • com.google.appinventor.components.runtime.VideoPlayer.ResizableVideoView
  • Enclosing class:
    VideoPlayer

    class VideoPlayer.ResizableVideoView
extends VideoView
    Extends VideoView to allow resizing of the view that ignores the aspect ratio of the video being played.
    Author:
    Vance Turnewitsch
